memberdef.name: kStdMsg
memberdef.initializer: = _("Copying these files into your project will remove this dependency.\ \nThis is safer, but needs more disk space.")

memberdef.name: kExtraMsgForMissingFiles
memberdef.initializer:
= _("

Files shown as MISSING have been moved or deleted and cannot be copied.\ 
Restore them to their original location to be able to copy into project.")
